pages.text: The further you go north or south, the cooler and wetter oasis climates will get. You'll also find new creatures and resources.$(br2)Stack sizes are smaller than usual for food, metals, and some crafting ingredients. For bulk transport, use caravans, wagons, or trains.
You respawn at a new location each time you die, even if you've slept in a bed. Your items stay on your corpse.$(br2)When you respawn, you'll be at a random location within 1500m of your spawn point.

pages.title: Leaving the Wastes
pages.text: There's only one way to escape from the Wastes: create a Token of the Unspoiled Lands, and use it to depart for a better world.
